channel.title: linux on Goofing Osamu
channel.description: Recent content in linux on Goofing Osamu

item.title: dmesg for SATA
item.description: After having a loose SATA cable problem and fixed it, I happen to see dmesg as: $ sudo dmesg ... [ 2.373152] sd 0:0:0:0: [sda] 937703088 512-byte logical blocks: (480 GB/447 GiB) [ 2.373156] sd 0:0:0:0: [sda] Write Protect is off [ 2.373158] sd 0:0:0:0: [sda] Mode Sense: 00 3a 00 00 [ 2.373165] sd 0:0:0:0: [sda] Write cache: enabled, read cache: enabled, doesn't support DPO or FUA [ 2.373173] sd 2:0:0:0: [sdb] 468862128 512-byte logical blocks: (240 GB/224 GiB) [ 2.
